base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with two doors.
part_description: Two vertical doors with handles, rectangular shape, positioned at the front. Flat top surface, rectangular sides, and a back panel.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. The handles are attached to the lower part of each door for easy gripping. The doors meet at the center when closed, providing a seamless front appearance.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or in a corner. It interacts with users by providing storage space accessible through the doors. The handles allow for easy opening and closing, while the flat top surface can support additional items.
